name: Umbrella Game
description:
Umbrella Game is a side scrolling adventure where you are a cocktail umbrella trying to make its way to a lonely Pina colada at the end of a moody bar

Controls

Move mouse left/right to tilt the umbrella

Left click to move forward slightly 

Ride the wind and avoid the bottles (The wind pushes you in the direction you are facing)

Land in the cup at the end to win
